stage.welcome_msg:
Tie Breaker!
Can you answer this question?

identification.q: This is a condition in a computer program that occurs when the true result of a floating-point operation is smaller in magnitude or closer to zero than the smallest positive value that can be represented as a normal floating point number in the target datatype.
What is the name of the online computational knowledge engine that was created by Wolfram Research?

choose.q: Who did Linus Torvalds argue against about how “Linux is Obsolete”?
